text: ロボットは仕事を終え
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: #FFF7E0;left: 1.75%;top: 6.64%;width: 29.33%;height: 3.91%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: #FFF7E0;left: 33.75%;top: 7.12%;width: 26.50%;height: 3.68%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text: 未亡人は新たな愛を見つけた
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: #FFF7E0;left: 64.75%;top: 6.64%;width: 32.83%;height: 4.03%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
ある日、１人の男が
ロボットの少女だった
ねじれた金属を見つけた
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: #FFF7E0;left: 36.08%;top: 25.86%;width: 30.17%;height: 5.46%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
彼女のハートを
彼は持ち帰った
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: #FFF7E0;left: 69.08%;top: 25.98%;width: 23.83%;height: 4.03%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
それを元に彼は
娘へ贈るオルゴールを作った
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: #FFF7E0;left: 18.92%;top: 58.24%;width: 34.17%;height: 3.56%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;
